text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
Proposed Resolution 20-991 (Deemed Approved November 8, 2014)

20 DCSTAT 4730

A PROPOSED RESOLUTION

Officially Read
September 23,
2014

To confirm the reappointment of Ms. Senora Simpson to the Board of Physical Therapy.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Board of Physical Therapy Senora Simpson Confirmation
Resolution of 2014".
Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the reappointment of:
Senora Simpson
323 Quackenbos Street, N.E.
Washington D.C. 20011
(Ward 4)
as a licensed physical therapist member of the Board of Physical Therapy, in accordance with
section 2(f) of the Confirmation Act of 1978, effective March 3, 1979 (D.C. Law 2-142; D.C.
Official Code § 1-523.0 l (f)), and pursuant to section 209 of the District of Columbia Health
Occupations Revision Act of 1985, effective March 25, 1986 (D.C. Law 6-99; D.C. Official
Code § 3-1202.09), for a term to end April 16, 2015.
Sec. 3. The Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of this resolution,
upon its adoption, each to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Board of
Physical
Therapy
Senora
Simpson
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
